#nametype [nametype]: 142
The Unmarked are Fomorians from a few blessed families, untouched by the physical afflictions of the Curse. With the goat's head as the only visible sign of the Curse, these families have risen in power and influence. Many of them are trained as priests, mages or sacred warriors of the kingdom.
